  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2784</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Friendship Club -Lesson plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Freundschaft-Verein - Lektionplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le club d'amitié - plan de leçon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O clube do friendship - planta da lição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il randello di amicizia - programma di lezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λέσχη φιλίας - σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El club de la amistad - plan de la lección</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students both and asnwer questions discuss and write about aspects of friendship.Includes an assessment Rubric and actual examples</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der die 
beide Kursteilnehmer und die asnwer Fragen über Aspekte von 
friendship.Includes eine Einschätzung Rubrik und tatsächlichen 
Beispiele behandeln und schreiben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants les deux et les questions d'asnwer discutent et écrivent 
au sujet des aspects de friendship.Includes une rubrique d'évaluation
et des exemples réels</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes ambos e as perguntas do asnwer discutam e escrevam sobre 
aspectos de friendship.Includes um rubric da avaliação e uns 
exemplos reais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli
allievi entrambi e le domande del asnwer discutono e scrivono circa le
funzioni di friendship.Includes una rubrica di valutazione e gli 
esempi reali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου 
σπουδαστές και οι δύο και asnwer ερωτήσεις συζητά και γράφει 
για τις πτυχές της φιλίας περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης 
και πραγματικά παραδείγματα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes ambos y las preguntas del asnwer discuten y escriben 
sobre aspectos de friendship.Includes una rúbrica del gravamen y 
ejemplos reales</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
